products.name: Katana Samurai Steel
products.description: A traditional samurai katana forged from high-quality steel, perfect for collectors and practitioners alike.

products.name: Folded Steel Katana
products.description: An authentic folded steel katana crafted by master swordsmiths, renowned for its strength and sharpness.

products.name: Dragon Tsuba Katana
products.description: A katana featuring a dragon-themed tsuba (guard) and a Damascus steel blade, a masterpiece of traditional craftsmanship.

products.name: Black Iron Katana
products.description: A sleek black iron katana with a razor-sharp edge, designed for swift and precise cutting.

products.name: Gold-Plated Katana
products.description: A luxurious katana featuring a gold-plated hilt and scabbard, a symbol of status and elegance.
